creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil with randa; red ground with narrow warp stripes in bue, pink, green and white; supplementary weft patterning of zoomorphic figures and geometric design.
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
